text: Allan Melvin (February 18, 1923 â€“ January 17, 2008) was an American actor who was in many television programs. Melvin was born in Kansas City, Missouri. He was in many shows like The Brady Bunch, The Dick Van Dyke Show, and All in the Family. Melvin died from cancer on January 17, 2008 in Brentwood, California at the age of 84. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1923 births Category:2008 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Kansas City, Missouri Category:Cancer deaths in California
